天秤押し: (てんびんおし) - pressing the top of a pickle vat by hanging a weight on a staff, used as a lever (in Kyoto suguki pickle making)
天秤棒: (てんびんぼう) - shoulder carrying pole
天空: (てんくう) - sky; air; ether; firmament; the heavens
天空海濶: (てんくうかいかつ) - (yoji) the open sky and the serene sea; as open as the sky and serene as the sea; magnanimous
天空海闊: (てんくうかいかつ) - (yoji) the open sky and the serene sea; as open as the sky and serene as the sea; magnanimous
天竜: (てんりょう) - deva and naga; heavenly dragon
天竜八部衆: (てんりゅうはちぶしゅう) - the eight legions (devas, nagas, yaksas, gandharvas, asuras, garudas, kimnaras, mahoragas)
天童: (てんどう) - cherub; gods disguised as children; children parading as cherubs
天竺: (てんじく) - India; cotton sheeting; foreign/imported; ultra-spicy/extra hot
天竺楽: (てんじくがく) - gagaku of Indian origin
天竺浪人: (てんじくろうにん) - wandering lordless samurai
天竺鯛: (テンジクダイ) - vertical-striped cardinalfish (Apogon lineatus); Indian perch; coral fish
天竺鼠: (テンジクネズミ) - guinea pig (any of five guinea pig species, esp. Cavia porcellus)
天籟: (てんらい) - sound of wind; beautiful poetry
天糸瓜: (ヘチマ) - sponge gourd/dishcloth gourd/loofah; sponge cucumber; (metaphorically, generally in negative sentences) something useless
天網: (てんもう) - heaven's vengeance; heaven's net
天網恢々: (てんもうかいかい) - (yoji) heaven's vengeance is slow but sure; heaven's net is wide and coarse, yet nothing slips through
天網恢恢: (てんもうかいかい) - (yoji) heaven's vengeance is slow but sure; heaven's net is wide and coarse, yet nothing slips through
天網恢恢疎にして漏らさず: (てんもうかいかいそにしてもらさず) - Heaven's net has large meshes, but nothing escapes
天罰: (てんばつ) - divine punishment/wrath of God/justice of heaven/nemesis; suitable punishment/just deserts/come-uppance
天罰が下る: (てんばつがくだる) - to receive divine punishment
天罰覿面: (てんばつてきめん) - (yoji) the certainty of divine punishment; Swift is Heaven's vengeance
天翔ける: (あまかける) - to soar (esp. of spirits and gods)
天翔る: (あまかける) - to soar (esp. of spirits and gods)
天耳通: (てんにつう) - divine hearing (one of the six supernormal Buddhist powers)
天職: (てんしょく) - vocation/lifework/calling; sacred task (esp. the emperor's rule over the nation); prostitute of the second-highest class (Edo period)
天色: (てんしょく) - weather; sky colour; sky color
天花: (てんけ) - flowers that bloom in the heavens; paper flowers scattered before the Buddha's image
天草: (テングサ) - any red algae in the family Gelidiaceae (esp. Gelidium crinale)
天華: (てんけ) - flowers that bloom in the heavens; paper flowers scattered before the Buddha's image
天蓋: (tengai) - dossel, cúpula; capuz de palha do menestrel sacerdotal, capuz de palha usado pelos sacerdotes Komuso
天蚕: (ヤママユ) - Japanese oak silkmoth (Antheraea yamamai)
天蛾: (スズメガ) - hawk moth (any moth of family Sphingidae); hawkmoth; sphinx moth
天蠍宮: (てんかつきゅう) - Scorpio (8th zodiacal sign); the Scorpion
天衣無縫: (てんいむほう) - (yoji) perfect beauty with no trace of artifice; flawless
天袋: (てんぶくろ) - storage space above closet
天覧相撲: (てんらんずもう) - {sumo} wrestling performed in imperial presence
天覧試合: (てんらんじあい) - game held with the Emperor in attendance
天誅: (てんちゅう) - heaven's punishment/divine punishment; well-deserved punishment/just punishment
天賦: (tenpu) - natural (por exemplo, talento), innate, inborn, inherent
天賦の才: (てんぷのさい) - innate ability; innate talent; natural gift
天賦の才能: (てんぷのさいのう) - innate ability; innate talent; natural gift
天賦人権: (てんぷじんけん) - (yoji) natural rights of man
天赦日: (てんしゃにち) - auspicious day for any activity (according to the koyomi)
天路: (あまじ) - (てんとう, てんどう only) the sun; (てんとう, てんどう only) god of heaven and the earth; (てんとう, てんどう only) laws governing the heavens; (てんとう, てんどう only) {astron} celestial path/celestial motion; deva realm (svarga); (あまじ only) path in the heavens
天辺: (てっぺい) - top/summit/apex/peak; (てっぺん only)   (often in てっぺんを回る or てっぺん回る) twelve o'clock (usu. midnight); (esp. 頂辺 when in kanji) top of one's head/top of a helmet/(top of) scalp/crown
天辺押: (てっぺいおし) - pressing forward without giving a chance to explain
天辺押し: (てっぺいおし) - pressing forward without giving a chance to explain
天運: (てんうん) - destiny; will of Heaven; luck
天遍: (てんぺん) - natural calamity; striking phenomena in heaven and earth
天道: (あまじ) - (てんとう, てんどう only) the sun; (てんとう, てんどう only) god of heaven and the earth; (てんとう, てんどう only) laws governing the heavens; (てんとう, てんどう only) {astron} celestial path/celestial motion; deva realm (svarga); (あまじ only) path in the heavens
天道教: (てんどうきょう) - Cheondoism; Chondoism; Korean religion
天道様: (てんとうさま) - the sun; providence; god
天道虫: (テントウムシ) - ladybug (Harmonia axyridis); ladybird
天邪久: (あまのじゃく) - perversity/perverse person/contrary person/contrarian; antagonistic demon in Japanese folklore; demon under the feet of temple guardian statues
天邪鬼: (あまのじゃく) - perversity/perverse person/contrary person/contrarian; antagonistic demon in Japanese folklore; demon under the feet of temple guardian statues
天重: (てんじゅう) - box lunch with tempura
天長地久: (てんちょうちきゅう) - (yoji) coeval with heaven and earth
天長節: (てんちょうせつ) - Emperor's Birthday (national holiday held from 1868 to 1948)
天門冬: (てんもんどう) - dried Chinese asparagus root
天降り: (あまくだり) - retiring high-ranking government officials taking a lucrative job in a private or semi-private corporation; command (from superior to inferior, government to private sector, etc.)/order/imposition; (orig. meaning) descent from heaven
天降る: (あまくだる) - to descend from heaven
天険: (てんけん) - natural defences; natural defenses; steep place
天険に拠る: (てんけんによる) - to hold a mountain fortress
天雲: (あまぐも) - clouds in the sky
天面: (てんめん) - upper surface; top side
